text: Robert Colin Wilson (born 18 February 1928), known as Bob Wilson, is an English cricketer. He played for Kent County Cricket Club from 1952 to 1967. He was born in Bapchild, Kent. He appeared in 365 first-class cricket matches for the county.Bob Wilson, CricketArchive. title: Bob Wilson (cricketer)
